message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I think $14,000 is a fair starting price. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $10,000 is significantly below the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer, as I have another buyer interested at a lower price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can't go above $11,000. I hope we can reach a mutual agreement.
Bob, I'm trying to find a compromise here.  I'll come down to $11,500, but I need you to meet me halfway.  This truly is my final offer.  Let me know if this works for you.
